I have found the error.

In the final state, the smoke's temperature is abo=
ut 850K, and the
thermo properties of condensed-phase speciesH2O(L) are def=
ined between
300K and 600K.

If I change the upper limit (600K) by 2000K (i=
n "water.xml"), the
calcul give a result (maybe, the results are non physic=
al), but the
error was only due to the temperature limits in the definition=
 of
thermo properties.

Thanks.
Guillaume.

you =
can see the initial 
> guess, which is where I was seeing trouble.
